greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of sets of nonempty words with a total of n letters over n-ary alphabet such that if a letter occurs in the set all predecessors occur at least once.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
maple: h:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,
a:= n-> add(add((-1)^i*binomial(k, i)*h(n$2, k-i), i=0..k), k=0..n):
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 21 2018
